quote: Just don’t give up what you’re trying to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don’t think you can go wrong.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: Don’t aspire to make a living, aspire to make a difference.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don’t have time to feel sorry for myself. I don’t have time to complain. I’m going to press on.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Have a vision of excellence, a dream of success, and work like hell.
author: Dr. Samuel DuBois Cook

quote: Stretch your mind and fly.
author: Whitney M. Young, Jr.

quote: I have discovered in life that there are ways of getting almost anywhere you want to go, if you really want to go.
author: Langston Hughes
occupation: poet, social activist, novelist, and playwright

quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we’ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Have a vision. Be demanding.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Hold on to your dreams of a better life and stay committed to striving to realize it.
author: Earl G. Graves, Sr.

quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
author: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I am lucky that whatever fear I have inside me, my desire to win is always stronger.
author: Serena Williams

quote: I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: When I look at the future, it’s so bright it burns my eyes.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: Success isn’t about how much money you make, it’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: If you have no critics you’ll likely have no success.
author: Malcolm X

quote: It isn’t where you come from; it’s where you’re going that counts.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: Character is power.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Even if it makes others uncomfortable, I will love who I am.
author: Janelle Monáe

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: There is always light, if only we’re brave enough to see it. If only we’re brave enough to be it.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: I am no longer accepting the things I cannot change. I am changing the things I cannot accept.
author: Angela Y. Davis

quote: I have learned over the years that when one’s mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
author: Marcus Garvey
